process.heading: How We Get You Back to Comfort Fast

faq.question: How fast can you respond to an electrical emergency?
faq.answer: We guarantee a 60-minute response time for all emergency calls in the Atlanta metro area. Our electricians are on-call 24/7, including weekends and holidays. When your power fails or electrical hazards appear, we're already on our way.

faq.question: Do you offer financing for electrical panel upgrades?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer flexible financing options with approved credit for panel upgrades and major electrical work. Ask about our current 0% APR financing promotions. We believe everyone deserves safe, reliable electrical systems.

faq.question: Are your electricians certified and background-checked?
faq.answer: Absolutely. All Electro Pros electricians are licensed, insured, and undergo rigorous background checks. We also require ongoing training to stay current on the latest electrical codes and technology. You can trust who enters your home.

faq.question: What areas do you service in metro Atlanta?
faq.answer: We serve all of metro Atlanta including Fulton, DeKalb, Cobb, Gwinnett, and surrounding counties. If you're in the Atlanta area and need electrical help, we can reach you within 60 minutes for emergencies.

faq.question: Do you provide warranties on electrical work?
faq.answer: Yes. All repairs come with a 90-day labor warranty. New installations include manufacturer warranties and our lifetime service guarantee. We stand behind every job we complete.

serviceAreas.heading: Serving All of Metro Atlanta
